text: Magnetic coupling Elen2003 –Electric and Magnetic Systems •To be able to calculate the induced voltage in circuits that are coupled magnetically to another circuit in which a time-varying current flows • Carefully analyse various practical scenarios of a time-varying current and reduce these to a simple model where the induced currents in secondary circuits can be determined Structures underneath power lines fence Human shelter Power line Structures underneath and along power lines fence Lightning current termination into ground
